component.name: org.nuxeo.ecm.core.CoreService
component.documentation: The core service provides a way to register version removal policies

extension-point.name: versionRemovalPolicy
extension-point.documentation: Used to register the version removal policy, which must implement VersionRemovalPolicy.

extension-point.name: orphanVersionRemovalFilter
extension-point.documentation: Used to register filter that are used by the default VersionRemovalPolicy implementation to check asynchronously what versions can really be removed.
